blockquote.p: The function templates defined in 20.2.2 and 24.7 are available when <string_view> is included.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4606.

blockquote.p: -1- In addition to being available via inclusion of the <iterator> header, the function templates in 24.7 are available when any of the following headers are included: <array>, <deque>, <forward_list>, <list>, <map>, <regex>, <set>, <string>, <string_view>, <unordered_map>, <unordered_set>, and <vector>.
